data.title: Groningen Europapark → Amsterdam Schiphol Airport by Train
data.meta_description: Travel by train from Groningen Europapark to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport in 2h 14m. Get train times, compare prices & buy cheap train tickets for Groningen Europapark to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport today.
data.text:
Thinking about taking the train from Groningen Europapark to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport? We’ve got you covered.

It usually takes around 2 hours 27 minutes to travel the 98 miles (158 km) from Groningen Europapark to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport by train, although you can get there in as little as 2 hours 14 minutes on the fastest services. You’ll normally find around 53 trains per day running on this route. You won’t need to worry about making any changes along the way either as direct trains are available. You'll be hopping on a Nederlanse Spoorwegen (NS) service on your way to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport. As the main rail operator in the Netherlands, all trains are modern with comfortable seating.

Train tickets from Groningen Europapark to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport start from €30.40 when you book in advance, which can be cheaper than buying them on the day. Start a search in our Journey Planner to check out the latest prices.

Keen to book your train tickets to Amsterdam Schiphol Airport? No need to wait, start a search with us today! If you want to find out a bit more about the journey first, you can find our train timetable below, tips on booking cheap tickets and our FAQs, including first and last train times.
